dct_title_s: De gelegentheyt van t'paradys ende t'landt Canaan, mitsgaders de eerst bewoonde landen
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Duytsche mylen" and "Uren gaens".
Shows topography, drainage, vegetation, boundaries, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Features illustrations of a sea monster, ships, and settlements.
Decorative cartouche with an illustration of a fisherman.
Descriptive text, e.g.: Dese kaerte wert gestelt voor het 3. cap. Genesis.
